{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3013527,"name":"oshriNoN","username":"oshriNoN","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/o/ea5d25/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-02-26T22:59:08.959Z","cooked":"

Hi there!
We are currently strungling with a but of tipping issue woth our robot.
We’ve managed to set ramp up time to our drive motors but the paoblem is that as soon as we release the joystick the drive wheels realign themselves back to zero.
We would like the wheels to stay in their last angle until they are getting a new input.
We cant aeem to figure out of theres a way to set the wheels angle differently to what currently running (first time running swerve and didn’t have alot of time to test it since the pandemic).
We are using the mk3 swerve with the sds library, our code is based on the sds example code
Thanks in advance!
Team 7039
